resp = client.index(
    index="products",
    id="0",
    refresh=True,
    document={
        "name": "LED TV",
        "resellers": [
            {
                "reseller": "companyA",
                "price": 350
            },
            {
                "reseller": "companyB",
                "price": 500
            }
        ]
    },
)
print(resp)
